extensionDescription.message: Krásně vizualizované statistiky pro vaše e-mailové účty Thunderbird

activeAccounts.color: Give each account a custom color to distinguish between them in comparison mode.
activeAccounts.description: Enable or disable accounts. Disabled accounts won't appear in any accounts list or stats.
activeAccounts.label: Active Accounts
activeAccounts.sumAndCompare: Activating more than one account enables the 'All Accounts' stats filter option for sum and comparison view.

cache.description: Enable caching system for faster display of already processed stats data.
cache.label: Activate Cache

clearCache.description: Remove all cached stats data from all accounts. Will be rebuild on opening the stats page again.
clearCache.label: Vymazat mezipaměť

darkMode.description: Přepíná mezi tmavým a světlým barevným schématem
darkMode.label: Tmavý režím

leaderCount.description: Number of entries shown in charts listing frequent contacts (999 maximum)
leaderCount.label: Leader Count

localIdentities.description: Čárkami oddělený seznam e-mailových adres, které budou považovány za lokální (v poli 'od')
localIdentities.label: Místní identity

note.refreshCacheRequired: If changed, cache needs to be rebuild
note.reloadStatsPage: Options are automatically saved. Some option changes cannot be automatically applied to an already open stats page or to existing cache entries, if cache is activated. They are marked with corresponding icons.
note.reloadWindowRequired: If changed, stats window needs to be reloaded
note.title: Poznámka

ordinate.description: Display vertical axis for all line and bar charts
ordinate.label: Vertical Axis

resetOptions.description: Reset all options to their default values. Depending on which options you changed before, a window or cache refresh may be required.
resetOptions.label: Reset Options
resetOptions.removeIdentities: This will also remove all local identities you created.

selfMessages.description: Exclude messages that were sent from me to myself

info.anyAccount: Messages where sender and receiver are identities from any account will be excluded
info.none: Messages to self will be included and treated as normal emails (default)
info.sameAccount: Messages where sender and receiver are identities from the same account will be excluded

selfMessages.label: Messages to Self

startOfWeek.description: Custom start of week for all weekday related charts
startOfWeek.label: Počáteční den týdne

tagColors.description: Draw charts about tags using corresponding tag colors
tagColors.label: Tag Colors

stats.accountEmpty: Tento účet je prázdný, nejsou tu žádné e-maily.

contactsJunk.description: Number of emails marked as Junk per sender
contactsJunk.title: Flagged as Junk

contactsSent.description: Počet e-mailů přijatých od jednotlivých odesílatelů
contactsSent.title: Nejvíce odesláno

tagsCount.description: Total number of emails per tag
tagsCount.title: Štítky

temporalDistribution.description: Počet e-mailů dle dní v týdnu a denní doby
temporalDistribution.title: Časová distribuce

weekday.description: Počet e-mailů dle dní v týdnu
weekday.title: Týden

stats.disclaimer:
ThirdStats makes no claim to the correctness of the data displayed.
In case of possible problems, please create a bug report.
stats.loadingInProgress: Načítám všechny e-mail z tohoto účtu…
stats.nonEmptyFolders: non-empty folders | non-empty folder | non-empty folders
stats.starAndImprove: Označte tento projekt hvězdičkou a vylepšete jej na Github
stats.title: Statistiky

tooltips.comparisonWhenAccountsOption:
Account comparison is only available
if more than one account is activated in add-on options
tooltips.comparisonWhenFilter:
Account comparison is only available
if 'All Accounts' is selected in accounts filter above

error.dateOrderEnd: Datum ukončení musí být po datu zahájení
error.dateOrderStart: Start date must be before end date

tooltips.exportData: Export currently displayed data as JSON file
